|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [openingCoords](./blockly.menu_class.openingcoords_property.md) |  | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) \| null | Coordinates of the mousedown event that caused this menu to open. Used to prevent the consequent mouseup event due to a simple click from activating a menu item immediately. |
